company: DHL Supply Chain India Pvt. Ltd.

details.title: MAWM Active
details.description: Conducted UAT of D2M warehouse and operations training. Development and maintenance of  ZPL and Jasper reports. Configuration of WELSPUN DC for system driven putaway with EDI interfacing.

details.title: Analytics
details.description: Implemented KPI dashboards (leveraging company SaaS platform) for enhanced visibility and data-driven decision making. Created insightful reports using IBM Cognos for comprehensive supply chain analysis. Developed dynamic dashboards on Power BI to facilitate real-time performance monitoring.

details.title: OS migration
details.description: Successfully managed the complete end-to-end UAT of WMOS 2017 during the RHEL 8 Linux OS upgrade project, ensuring a smooth transition. (delivered in 75 days)

company: DHL Supply Chain India Pvt. Ltd.

details.title: WMOS 2017
details.description:
Implementating of NIKE omnichannel warehouse. End to end system integration SIT and UAT with Myntra and Flipkart systems including API payload testing and ,mapping. Printing config  of invoice, shipping label and carton label with single print command  at 50+ pack stations.
Configuration of item master, case as well as item level receiving of ASN, system driven put-away, zoning and slotting locations, sorting putwall, anchor carton, cycle count, pick/pack to tote/carton, pick/pack cart, shipment and manifesting using system for NIKE, Loreal and Custom Bonded warehouses. 
Printing of multiple documents using a single print queue was configured for B2C operations.

details.title: Post Go-live support
details.description: Designed solutions for inventory optimization after system launch. Negotiated and delivered optimal solutions based on customer technical team requirements.

details.title: Customer & Operational Support
details.description: Addressed customer and operational needs related to printing, inventory reporting, and process improvement. Ensured customer satisfaction by consistently delivering optimal solutions.

company: DHL Supply Chain India Pvt. Ltd.

details.title: Comprehensive Warehouse Business Analysis
details.description: Conducted a deep dive into warehouse operations, analyzing IT, transportation, and operational processes. Presented findings to senior leadership (Board of Vice Presidents).

details.title: WMS Configuration
details.description: Successfully configured a retail cosmetics business unit in WMOS 2017 (QA environment) after thoroughly studying the production environment. Demonstrated proficiency in WMS configuration.

details.title: Heat Treatment Test
details.description: Conducted a metallurgical study on 310MoLN tubes at elevated temperatures, systematically analyzing microstructural changes and carbon corrosion. The primary objective of this study was to ascertain the optimum working temperature of these tubes within the context of a urea plant.

details.title: Exemption Calculator
details.description: Developed an Impact Test Exemption Calculator utilizing VBA and referencing ASME standards. This innovative tool significantly streamlined the process of determining exemption factors, resulting in a remarkable 70% reduction in decision-making time.

details.title: Program Manager
details.description: Management of a DISH seminar and underwent welding training.

details.title: Digital Maintainance
details.description: Modeling and drafting of material handling equipment.Designing of forklift overhead shaft.

details.title: Material Analysis
details.description: Served as an assistant in destructive testing and analysis of materials for quality assurance purposes using Hypermesh.
